title: Timetable adjustments on the Ararat line
articleContent:
From Sunday 11 July 2021, adjustments will be made to afternoon weekday train timetables on the Ararat line. The changes apply for services travelling in both directions between Ararat and Southern Cross stations.

View the new timetable for the Ararat line

V/Line coach timetables will also change to maintain reliable connections with the new train timetable and provide a better spread of services on the weekend. 

View the new timetable for V/Line coach services

To plan your journey, visit the Journey planner or order a printed copy of a timetable by calling 1800 800 007.
